metadata.name: Volume Shadow Copy Mount
metadata.comment: Detects volume shadow copy mount via Windows event log

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM file_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('12') AND lower(metadata.log_provider) = lower('microsoft-windows-ntfs') AND metadata.event_code = 98 AND contains(lower(device.name), lower('harddiskvolumeshadowcopy')))

output.summary: Detects volume shadow copy mount via Windows event log

metadata.objective: False positive: Legitimate use of volume shadow copy mounts (backups maybe). Reference: https://github.com/redcanaryco/atomic-red-team/blob/f339e7da7d05f6057fdfcdd3742bfcf365fee2a9/atomics/T1003.002/T1003.002.md#atomic-test-3---esentutlexe-sam-copy
